item.title: Currency agnosticism
item.description: What’s currency agnosticism? Atomic Swaps Third-Party Integrations What’s currency agnosticism? That means buyers aren’t limited to using the PART coin as a form of payment. They are able to use many currencies, including Bitcoin, among others. This provides a use-case for many different coins and gives them a fee-less and untraceable way to spend their cryptocurrencies without having to either go through a third-party or sell their coins for fiat on exchanges.
